title: 036 - Bob Smiley - Whispering, Pot Pies and 6 Year Old Tim
description:
Bob is back for another Poddy Break! Tim and Caleb try to whisper for the entire episode. Freight doesn’t have a foamy thing on his microphone. Bob buys groceries for Crappaw. Tim specifies what a sandwich is. The gang talks about who makes them laugh. And Caleb sings the Hippopotamus Song.
 Also on this episode: Tim loses his cheese stick. Bob leaves a Gonzo mug in his attic. Freight does an impersonation. Caleb has an audio meltdown. The gang discusses how early is too early for a pot pie. And we hear an interview with Tim at 6 years old by his father, Dave “Coach” Hawkins.
 Follow us @poddybreakEmail us at poddybreak@rockshowcomedy.com  Click here  to see Tim LIVE!!!
 Check out Bob’s Website - http://www.bobsmiley.com/Tweet Bob @bobsmileycomic
